request_fs_permission_note:
Yuan will have access to your local computer's workspace with your authorization.

The workspace stores your outputs (strategies and indicators) and the configuration required to run them.

None of your code output will be uploaded to the server, which is very safe.

Before we begin, we need your authorization.


Thanks to the development of web technology, we have a way to connect to your local file directory directly in the browser without you having to package and upload it.

You can choose any method to synchronize the workspace between computers, such as Git, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive or even copy it with a USB flash drive.

The access authorization to the directory will only be valid until all tabs of Yuan are closed. You will need to re-authorize next time you open Yuan.


Requires Chrome 86 / Edge 86 and above
